title: Global R & D expenditure of Puma from 2013 to 2019
summary: The Global R R&D expenditure euros of Puma was to 61.7 million in 2019 .
This was up from 54.0 million the Year earlier , the highest euros in the past six years .
What is the R&D expenditure euros ? R&D expenditure is essentially the amount of money a bank has on hand in case it needs to cover unexpected expenses from risky transactions .
